info.name: Readable Column - Khronos.org Forums
info.description:
Narrows the column of posts and increases text size inside posts to 110%, making post text 45em or about 15 words wide, to increase readability.

Edit 2016-03-05: Fixed the style to apply to the new forum domain.
info.additionalInfo: If you like to read about Vulkan on these forums, you might also like to read about it on my site here: http://ahcox.com/vulkan/
